Centennial.Grand View Estates, Colorado:
Grand View Estates is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) in Douglas County, Colorado, United States. The population was 528 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Grand View Estates is located in northern Douglas County at 39°32′37″N 104°49′19″W (39.543738, -104.821856), between Stonegate and Parker to the east and Lone Tree to the west.
